description:
Fix the issue that Alt+Shift is not properly handled in the keyboard overlay.

BUG=chromium-os:13614
TEST=manually on the netbook

Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=79981

messages.text:
LGTM

http://codereview.chromium.org/6675037/diff/2001/chrome/browser/resources/keyboard_overlay.js
File chrome/browser/resources/keyboard_overlay.js (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/6675037/diff/2001/chrome/browser/resources/keyboard_overlay.js#newcode230
chrome/browser/resources/keyboard_overlay.js:230: return modifiers.join(SEPARATOR);
Would be nice to add a comment with an example.

http://codereview.chromium.org/6675037/diff/2001/chrome/browser/resources/keyboard_overlay.js#newcode234
chrome/browser/resources/keyboard_overlay.js:234: return action.join(SEPARATOR);
ditto.

http://codereview.chromium.org/6675037/diff/2001/chrome/browser/resources/keyboard_overlay.js
File chrome/browser/resources/keyboard_overlay.js (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/6675037/diff/2001/chrome/browser/resources/keyboard_overlay.js#newcode230
chrome/browser/resources/keyboard_overlay.js:230: return modifiers.join(SEPARATOR);
On 2011/03/30 12:10:16, satorux1 wrote:
> Would be nice to add a comment with an example.

Done.

http://codereview.chromium.org/6675037/diff/2001/chrome/browser/resources/keyboard_overlay.js#newcode234
chrome/browser/resources/keyboard_overlay.js:234: return action.join(SEPARATOR);
On 2011/03/30 12:10:16, satorux1 wrote:
> ditto.

Done.

LGTM, but:

http://codereview.chromium.org/6675037/diff/5001/chrome/browser/resources/keyboard_overlay.js
File chrome/browser/resources/keyboard_overlay.js (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/6675037/diff/5001/chrome/browser/resources/keyboard_overlay.js#newcode226
chrome/browser/resources/keyboard_overlay.js:226: *   keycode: 'd', modifiers: ['CTRL', 'SHIFT'] => 'd<>ALT<>SHIFT'
Did you mean: d<>CTRL<>SHIFT

subject: Fix the issue that Alt+Shift is not properly handled in the keyboard overlay.
